forum.content:
i think I really need some time to unwind

im fed up to findthat somewhere that i can hide
and im not alright ,and im not fine
watching the time pass me by
u know u﻿ tried , alright
sometime i thought of u
i wondering wat would u do ?
but ***** these rules ,this game we'er born to lose
thats why i hate u judge me dude ...

妳並不曉得我究竟經歷了什麼。
#冷色系#霧感#灰色系
forum.title: 我已經在努力了、不要喜歡別人好嗎
